title: Evidence-Based Dentistry (EBD) Competency Enhancement Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental knowledge and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Competency-based training for in-service professionals with interactive learning enabled by digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can formulate and refine PICO (Problem, Intervention, Comparison, Outcome) questions in clinical contexts.
Learners can systematically analyze research evidence following the 5-step EBD process (Question, Search, Critique, Apply, Evaluate).
Learners can apply EBD principles when developing personalized treatment plans and logically justify their rationale.
Learners can self-assess their competency levels in the EBD implementation process based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
